name: Icon Bops
description: If enabled, the icons will bop more closely to Kade Engine.

name: Sustains
description: If enabled, sustains will look more accurate towards older Kade Engine builds.

name: Sustain Scale
description:
Custom scale of the sustains. Requires 'Kade Sustains' to work.
Default scale is 44.

name: Sustain Cliprect
description: If enabled, sustains will simply disappear upon inputting them instead of clipping through the strum.

name: Sustain Alpha
description: If enabled, sustains' alpha values become full.

name: Game Zooming
description:
If enabled, the song will start with camZooming enabled.
Does not work for Tutorial.

name: Forced Health Colors
description: If enabled, the health bar's colors will be set to the ones found in base game/early Kade Engine, or a custom set one.

name: New Botplay Text Position
description: If enabled, the botplay text will have a new position more closer to the health bar.

name: Strum Animations
description: If enabled, the opponents strums will stay static, even if they hit a note. Your strums will also not play an animation during botplay.

name: New Character Hold Times
description: If enabled, the characters' hold timers will be extended based on the bpm. This makes them sing for a little less time.

name: Score Text Consistent Position
description:
If enabled, the new score text's x position won't center when the text changes.
Not normally recommended.

name: Show NPS in Score Text
description: If disabled, the NPS part of the score text becomes hidden.

name: Show Score in Score Text
description:
If disabled, the Score part of the score text becomes hidden.
Erm... is it really 'scoreTxt' at that point?

name: Show Misses in Score Text
description: If disabled, the Misses part of the score text becomes hidden.

name: Show MS in Score Text
description: If disabled, the MS part of the score text becomes hidden.

name: Show Accuracy in Score Text
description: If disabled, the Accuracy part of the score text becomes hidden.

name: Show Rank in Score Text
description: If disabled, the Rank part of the score text becomes hidden.

name: Show FC in Score Text
description: If disabled, the FC part of the score text becomes hidden.

name: New Strum Positions
description:
If enabled, the strum positions get recalculated.
This will accumulate with 'Kade Strum Positions'.

name: Kade Strum Positions
description: If enabled, the strum position gets shifted to the left a bit.

name: Show Watermark
description: If disabled, hides the watermark.

name: Simple Watermark
description: If enabled, the watermark text becomes much more simpler.

name: Watermark Consistent Position
description: If enabled, the watermark's x position sticks to the left.
